Italijan v ovinku kar naravnost, nato pa na bok
Voznik je odklonil preizkus alkoholiziranosti, zato so mu začasno odvzeli vozniško dovoljenje.
04 Nov 2019, 18:33 by T. K.
DOBROVO – V soboto so bili policisti obveščeni o prometni nesreči med Dobrovim in Neblim v Goriških brdih.Ugotovljeno je bilo, da je 43-letni državljan Italije med vožnjo v ovinku zapeljal z vozišča. Pri tem se je na avtomobilu razbilo prednje steklo in voznika v porezalo po roki. Posredovali so gasilci JZ GRD Nova Gorica, zavarovali mesto nesreče in s tehničnim posegom vozilo postavili na kolesa ter iz njega rešili voznika. Vozilo je bilo v nevoznem stanju.Prometni policisti so vozniku odredili preizkus alkoholiziranosti z alkotestom, a ga je odklonil, zato so mu začasno odvzeli vozniško dovoljenje in prepovedali nadaljnjo vožnjo na podlagi zakona o prekrških. Zoper njega je bilzaradi kršitev zakona o pravilih cestnega prometa podan obdolžilni predlog na okrajno sodišče.

Italian in a bend as straight as possible, then to the flank
The driver refused an alcohol test and was temporarily revoked.
04 Nov 2019, 18:33 by T.K.
DOBROVO - Police on Saturday were notified of a car accident between Dobrov and Neblim in the Goriška Brda region. A 43-year-old Italian citizen was found to be driving off a car in a detour. In doing so, the windshield was smashed on the car and the driver was cut into the hand. Firefighters from the Public Health Center GRD Nova Gorica intervened, secured the scene of the accident and, with technical intervention, put the vehicle on wheels and rescued the driver. The vehicle was in a non-driving state. Traffic police ordered the driver to undergo an alcohol test, but refused, so they temporarily revoked his driving license and banned him from driving further under the law on misdemeanors. An indictment was filed against him for a violation of the Road Traffic Law Act to the county court.
